item.title: Build Harness
item.description: The primary benefit of using a build-harness is it allows for the consolidation of business logic related to building software. This allows to keep things DRY. Using a centralized repo that can be versioned and shared across multiple projects reduces long-term technical debt associated with building and releasing software by reducing maintenance effort. We provide one that we use in nearly all of our projects. It’s available here: https://github.com/cloudposse/build-harness

item.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
item.description: There are a lot of terms that roughly mean the same thing. MFA - Multi-factor Authentication OTP - One-time password (~MFA Token) 2FA - Two-factor authentication
